In recent year Low Level Laser therapy device grown popularity due increase scientific understanding mechanism action , publish research , patient demand non-invasive procedure body contour fat reduction . This study evaluate effectiveness low-level laser treatment without extraction adipose tissue use liposuction combination treatment modality .
